definition[0]: behaving in a way that is illegal or that society does not approve of
definition[1]: a delinquent debt, account etc has not been paid on time
definition[2]: someone, especially a young person, who breaks the law or behaves in ways their society does not approve of
example[1]: Deanes writes and lectures about teenage delinquents.
definition[3]: an account, debt etc that has not been paid at the right time, or has not been paid at all
example[2]: Creditor management allows lenders to reduce the risk of delinquent accounts.
